High.title: HIGH
High.content: There is no better environment for your parties than our VIP room. Here the rumba does not stop, schedule your reservation and let's break up together!

Dembow.title: DEMBOW
Dembow.content: At Skapate Hookah Bar you can experience a party on another level, an exclusive space with crossover music that will elevate your senses.

Vip.title: ZONA VIP
Vip.subtitle: Exclusive areas for exclusive people.
Vip.content: Reserve an exclusive space with the best view for the dance area, more privacy, comfort, with drinks, hookahs and quality essences.

Bar.title: To quench your thirst
Bar.subtitle: In these bars you'll never be without a drink
Bar.content: You can find exclusive liquors such as: Clase Azul Reposado, Macallan, Tequila Clase Azul Reposado, Cogna Hennessy, Ginebra HendrickÂ´s, Vodka Grey Grosee, Viuda de Clicquot

Cover.title: COVER?
Cover.subtitle: What's that?
Cover.content: The entrance to paradise and the pass to the show to dream and live an experience fused between smiles, party and lots of flavor, is FREE.
